The name of the db table this model primarily uses.
The Template class makes the creation of consistently themed web pages across your entire site simple and as automatic as possible.
public static function theme()
Returns the active theme.
protected static $theme_paths
An array of paths to look for themes.
public static function theme_url($resource = '')
Returns the full url to a file in the currently active theme.
function theme_view($view = null,
$data = null)
A shorthand method that allows views (from the current/default themes) to be included in any other view.
